welcome.title: We are getting MARRIED!
welcome.body: Welcome and thank you for visiting our wedding website! Here you will find all the information about our special day and any events leading up to it.

shower.title: Wedding Shower
shower.caution: Out of an abundance of caution for the health & safety of our loved ones, we have decided to host a drive-through wedding shower.
shower.drivethru: Drive by to show your love & support and enjoy curbside favors. In lieu of shopping & transporting gifts, consider a gift card or e-gift card. Thanks in advance for your understanding and generosity.

registry.intro: Your presence at the wedding is present enough for us! But, for those of you who are stubborn, we created a wish list...
